sentences.en: A design of multiplier wrench in digital - indicate is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍数显式行星力矩放大扳手的设计方法.

sentences.en: And so on. This positive feedback loop is called the multiplier effect.
sentences.cn: 这种正面的回馈循环正是我们通常说的“乘数效果”.

sentences.en: And then it compares the LUT method with the multiplier method.
sentences.cn: 比较了查找表和乘法器两种实现方案.

sentences.en: For the geometry depicted in Figure 2 - 2 , the lagrange multiplier is positive.
sentences.cn: 对于图 2-2 中所画的几何图形来说, 拉格朗日乘子是正的.

sentences.en: I gave yellow color and big multiplier to main direct light.
sentences.cn: 主要的直射灯光使用黄色和较大的倍增.

sentences.en: Optional effect pitch multiplier. Default is 1.0 , meaning default pitch.
sentences.cn: 任意效果的音调增效器. 音调的默认值是1.0.

sentences.en: Reduced damage multiplier for act - end boss attacks vs. minions.
sentences.cn: 为行动末端领头的攻击对宠儿减少损坏乘数.

sentences.en: The Color, Multiplier and Attenuation parameters can all be animated over time.
sentences.cn: 颜色, 放大器和减弱器都可以超时绘制.

sentences.en: The described multiplier is basedon the variable transconductance principle.
sentences.cn: 本文叙述一种可变跨导脉冲乘法器.

sentences.en: The register used to contain a multiplier in multiplication and the quotient in division.
sentences.cn: 在乘法运算中存放乘数,在除法运算中存放商的一种寄存器.

sentences.en: The topology of multiplier, which related with physical implementation closely, also advancedrapidly.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 与物理实现紧密相关的乘法器拓扑结构的研究也硕果累累.

sentences.en: This economic concept also considers the income multiplier of these tourist expenditures.
sentences.cn: 这种经济观念也关系到旅游消费收入的增加.

sentences.en: This multiplier used modified Booth Algorithm, Wallace tree and 4 - 2 compressor.
sentences.cn: 乘法器采用改进的Booth算法,简化了部分积符号扩展, 使用Wallace树结构和 4-2 压缩器对部分积归约.

sentences.en: Were the government to use a multiplier of five instead of three, the proportion of Americans below the poverty line would rise to more than 24 percent.
sentences.cn: 如果政府用5而不是3做乘数，那美国的贫困人口比例将会上升到24%以上。

sentences.en: Why to say telecommunication is the multiplier of productivity?
sentences.cn: 为何说电信是生产力的倍增器?

words.tran_cn: 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘
[数]乘数；[电子]倍增器；增加者；繁殖者

trans.tran_en: When you multiply a number by another number, the second number is the multiplier
